abstract: Books In the Spirit of Monte Carlo by Pamela Fiori, Escape: The Heyday of Caribbean Glamour by Hermes Mallea, and Palm Beach People by Hilary Geary Ross explore glamorous island retreats of rich and famous.
lead_paragraph: Three new books shed sun-drenched light on the world’s most luxurious cold-weather retreats, from Monte Carlo to the Caribbean to Palm Beach.
